name: BAPTISM
description: BAPTISM is a short kinetic novel about a madman, a child, and a lake.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: One that exists Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: Ones that work Storage: 124 MB available space Sound Card: A working one Additional Notes: It's not that big of a game, so any "well operating" Windows computer should work.
